pages.text: If an infected area reaches extremely dire straits, and enough Stage III-IV Beckons gather in once spot, a large amount of them will disappear without a trace. While it is unknown why this happens, what is known is that the remaining Stage IV Beckon will be substantially stronger after the process concludes, and global evolution will be bolstered.
I cannot stress how important it is to deal with Beckon infestations as they appear. If you find one, destroy it.$(br)I don't care how.
$(#630000)Interesting. We don't recall getting that many.
